definition: starved corpses fill the roads (idiom); state of famine

sentences.english: This vast territory of the Big Island made thousands of miles, everywhere hungry die of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 把這個地域遼闊的大島弄得赤地千里，餓殍遍地。

sentences.english: Where hunger is ugly, where souls are forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 那裏餓殍遍野，靈魂早被遺忘。
